mapper.insert: upsert into hxds.order_gps("id","order_id","driver_id","customer_id","latitude","longitude","speed","create_time") values(next value for hxds.og_sequence, ${order_id}, ${driver_id}, ${customerId}, '${latitude}', '${longitude}', '${speed}', now ( ) )
mapper.select: select "id", "latitude", "longitude", TO_CHAR("create_time", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') as 'createTime' from hxds.order_gps where "order_id" = #{orderId} order by "id" desc limit 1
